channel.title: Random on Islash8
channel.description: Recent content in Random on Islash8

item.title: Hello ... AGAIN
item.description: Greetings, internet! This is my third attempt at writing my “first” blog post, and hopefully it’ll stick this time. Life has thrown me some curveballs over the past few years, from graduating college to dealing with a breakup and moving away for a 9-month study program that wasn’t quite what I hoped for. Then I landed a job at a major automotive company that paid well, but left me feeling unsatisfied and unchallenged.
